faq.question: How often should I visit the dentist?
faq.answer: It is recommended to visit your dentist every 6 months for regular checkups and cleaning.

faq.question: What should I do if I have a dental emergency?
faq.answer: Contact us immediately. We provide emergency dental services. You can call us or visit our clinic.

faq.question: Do you provide painless treatments?
faq.answer: Yes, we use modern techniques and anesthesia to ensure painless treatments.

faq.question: Do you accept insurance?
faq.answer: Yes, we accept most major dental insurance plans. Please contact us for details.
